wikipedia_page.main: John Brian Gilbert (17 July 1887 – 28 July 1974) was an English men's singles tennis player.Gilbert competed in the 1924 Summer Olympics and the 1922-1933 Wimbledon Championships. Gilbert reached the semi finals at Wimbledon in 1922, beating Theodore Mavrogordato before losing to Randolph Lycett.
